title: Which Metallica's song is better: 'Enter Sandman' or 'Master of Puppets'? Why? - Quora

response.answer_text: (as a side note, I much prefer their third big hit, One, over either of these) It depends on what you’re looking for. Enter Sandman is much tamer, its not thrash at all. Its more like earlier metal. Master of Puppets is a thrash song. Its not really one of Metallica’s heavier songs, but its much heavier than anything off of the Black Album. Its also much more musically intricate, and has more introspective lyrics. By those criteria, i prefer Master of Puppets, but its really all up to the listener.

“Enter Sandman” is a classic crossover song in the history of heavy metal and a big part of the reason Metallica has had mainstream success…but “Master of Puppets” is Metallica’s Magnum Opus. One of the top 5 greatest songs in the history of the genre.
